review: So far I have two of these and they are amazing.  Plug it in, it connects to your wi-fi.  Amazon Prime and your other entertainment apps are there.  The only negative I can find is I have been unable to download VUDU, but this is ok because most of my VUDU movies are in flixter.  Fire TV stick is portable, so its great .  Comes with a remote, and your phone can also be used as a remote.  Setup is so easy, it's ridiculous.
